thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-BOK Financial Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-BOK Financial Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.11
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Bok Financial Corp:
* BOK FINANCIAL REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.11 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.34 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 REVENUE $168.2 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $392 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ‍ TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT RESULTED IN AN $11.7 MILLION OR $0.18 PER SHARE REDUCTION IN NET INCOME FOR Q4​
* WRITE-DOWN OF DEFERRED TAX ASSET WAS NECESSITATED BY EXPECTED LOWER FUTURE TAX RATES AND NEGATIVELY IMPACTED Q4 EARNINGS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
